name: Chubby is Life: Memory Game
description:
There's something better than chubby beautiful girls?
I don't know, but relaxing with a memory game with chubbeautys is life!

This simple game merges two things I love, chubby girls and low level of sensuality games.

Krita Hand Draw by me

Made with Gdevelop by me too :)

Developer & Artist: Rafael Batista Rocha
